DOC.detailed_description: Toothpastes use tooth brush good control microbial plaque . Herbal toothpastes recently gain attention . This study aim assess effect Aloe Vera toothpaste dental plaque gingivitis . This single-blind cross-over clinical trial conduct 20 dental student ( 10 male 10 female mean age 24.5±4 yr . ) gingivitis . Students randomly divide 2 group . The first group use Aloe Vera toothpaste 30 day plaque index ( PI ) gingival index ( GI ) record . A 2-week wash-out period allow subject use fluoride toothpaste next 30 day underwent PI GI assessment . This order reverse group 2 . Wilcoxon-Sign Rank two way Repeated Measure ANOVA test apply statistical analysis .
